main event: On October 8, 1961, multiple witnesses in Jensen, Utah observed a bright, unidentified object moving in the sky, displaying an erratic flight pattern.
interesting points: Witnesses described the object as a bright light, about the size of a dime at arm's length, moving in a zigzag pattern at high speed,The sighting lasted approximately 10 minutes and occurred around 8:30 PM,Another report from a different witness described a circular object, 30-40 feet in diameter, that hovered silently before accelerating rapidly,The incident prompted investigations by local authorities and the Air Force, and the case was classified as unresolved in the Project Blue Book files.
sighted object: A bright, unidentified object observed in the sky
witness description: Various witnesses reported seeing a bright object in the sky with different characteristics
